CustomField.description: Captures logic expression using the Salesforce Unique IDs of the defined rule criteria as operands ( rule criteria ) For Example : if a rule had 3 criteria : Criteria 1 (a0NA000000Rt5nTMAR ) , Criteria 2 (a0NA000000Rt5nYMAR ) , Criteria 3 (a0NA000000Rt5nYMAR ) the Formatted Filter logic for : Criteria 1 AND Criteria 2 OR Criteria 3 would be a0NA000000Rt5nTMAR AND a0NA000000Rt5nYMAR OR a0NA000000Rt5nnMAB During save the FormatedFilterLogic is calculated based on the value captured on the Filter_Logic value ( 1 AND 2 OR 3 ) The calcuation derives the SFDC id for the positional operators. The field is used hidden to the user and serves to "map" the logic expression with the criteria records
CustomField.label: FormattedFilterLogic
